climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: ❤Luxurious Bed Comforter Set - Queen size down alternative reversible comforter (88"x88") + 2 pillow shams (20"x26"). Extremely soft 100% brushed microfiber cover made by unique microvilli processing technology makes the comforter ultra soft & fluffy. Noise-Free and more Breathable, NO Tearing or Horrible Odor

❤All-Season Comforter Set - 3D&7D cooling down alternative fiber whole-piece filling, light-weight and well-distributed, without any concern for clumping. Summer Cooling and Winter Warm. Great choice for those who can't use goose down and feather bedding

❤Diamond Stitch Quilting & Great Gift Choice - Crafted with classic diamond stitching technology, secure the filling in place, with zero concern of filling leakage or loose thread. HYLEORY comforter set as a great gift for your family or friends on special occasions, birthday, new year, holiday
❤Machine Washable & Easy Care - Machine washable (in cold water), no shrinkage or fade which saves you a lot of time and energy. Tumble dry on low heat or sun-dry

❤After-Sale Service - We provide a 90-day satisfaction guarantee. If you are not satisfied with the product during use, please contact the Amazon Customer Service team directly or email us to obtain a satisfactory solution. HYLEORY values its customers and always aims to provide the most courteous customer service as well as the best quality goods
body.description: HYLEORY All-Season Series - All-Season Down Alternative Quilted Comforter Set We provide high quality products and services You will get: Twin: 1 Comforter+1 Pillow Sham Full: 1 Comforter+2 Pillow Shams Queen: 1 Comforter+2 Pillow Shams King: 1 Comforter+2 Pillow Shams California King: 1 Comforter+2 Pillow Shams Microvilli fabric surface: The unique microvilli processing technology is used to make the comforter surface have a layer of tiny fluff, which not only enhances the comfort, but also retains its air permeability, making it more soft and comfortable, and making the duvet insert really Summer Cooling and Winter Warm. 3D&7D fiber filling: Filled with snow down alternative fill, a state-of-the-art fiberfill that has the feel of authentic goose and duck down without the feathers, poking. Soft, breathable and lightweight. Size: Twin 64*88+20*26 inch Full 82*86+20*26*2 inch Queen 88*88+20*26*2 inch King 90*102+20*36*2 inch California King 96*104+20*36*2 inch Q: What if I find that the pillow shams are missing after receiving the product? A: You can contact us through your order to get the missed product. Q: Why is there a slight deviation between the color I received and the image I saw? A: The same color can sometimes produce significant color differences under different lighting conditions. If you are unable to accept the color you received, you can directly contact us for a satisfactory solution. We provide a 90-day satisfaction guarantee. If you are not satisfied with the product during use, please contact the Amazon Customer Service team directly or email us to obtain a satisfactory solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice comforter for the money good quality very warm
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice comforter better than what I expected I ordered a double for my queen and it fit perfect very warm nice and cozy highly recommend definitely buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I was very happy to have the warmth this offers. It's much better quality than my other that I replaced and I'm very impressed with the thickness and comfort it has. Here in the early winter I find myself kicking it off is so warm. I'm also saying on my heating bill with it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent not heavy comforter
reviews.reviewText: I get way to hot under the normal comfoter weights, I tried a quilt but didn't like the feel of the shams. Tried this and love it. Still warm on cold nights but not overbearing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not fitting for my need.
reviews.reviewText: I should have paid better attention as this blanket has a great price and I did not notice it was lightweight. It’s cold where I live so I need a warmer comforter so I returned before opening.
